All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddAppointmentController
This AddAppointmentController Class is linked to the add-appointment.fxml file which controls the view users will use to fill in a form for adding an appointment to the database.
AddCustomerController
A controller class the implements some logic for the Add Cusotmer view where users can create a customer.
AlertUtil
Class for showing Warning Dialogs to the user
Appointment
Model class for Appointments.
AppointmentController
Generic controller for adding and modifying appoinments
AppointmentReportController
This is the controller class for the appt-reports.fxml view.
Contact
Model class for Contacts.
Country
Model class for Countries.
Customer
Model class for Customers.
CustomerController
Generic controller class for add customer and modify customer views
CustomerReportController
This is the controller class for the customer-report.fxml view.
DBAppointment
A class containing several convenient functions for fetching and inserting appointments to and from the database.
DBConnection
This class opens and closes the connection to the database.
DBContact
A class for CRUD Contacts from the database
DBCountry
A class containing several convenient functions for fetching Countries from the database.
DBCustomer
A class containing several convenient functions for fetching and inserting Customers to and from the database.
DBDivision
A class containing several convenient functions for fetching and inserting divisions to and from the database.
DBUser
A class containing several convenient functions for fetching and inserting Users to and from the database.
Division
Model class for Divisions.
LoginController
LoginController is the controller class linked to the login.fxml view.
Main
Program entry.
MainViewController
Holds the main view.
ModifyAppointmentController
This ModifyAppointmentController Class is linked to the modify-appointment.fxml file which controls the view users will use to edit a form for modifying an appointment from the database.
ModifyCustomerController
Controller class attached to the modify-customer.fxml view.
SceneLoader
A class for conveniently navigating between views.
TimeUtils
A utility class for performing various tasks with dates, times, and timezones.
Translate
A class for conveniently translating strings into different languages
User
Model class for users
UXUtil
A Convenience class for initializing various GUI elements
